data.name: Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between Deluxe Soundtrack 5-Volume Set
data.detailed_description:
Close your eyes and experience the vibes of the spaces between spaces. A lonely park filled with sculptures. A drive during the witching hour with the stars glittering like shimmering specks of sand. A late night train carriage, gently rocking as it travels to its eventual destination.

The complete soundtrack collection from Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1449230/Glitchhikers_The_Spaces_Between/

This Deluxe 5-Volume Set of music will guide you on your journey through the spaces between – 71 tracks representing all the music in the game, including a 10-track anthology of guest composers, featuring a brand new song from Canadian indie rock band TOPS.

data.short_description: Chill out as you journey through the spaces between spaces, with the 5-Volume Deluxe Soundtrack for Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between, 71 tracks representing all the music in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Storage: 628 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 3 GB available space
